name: You Are Not Alone (Abhishek Joshi, Abhay_Joshi)
name_original: You Are Not Alone (Abhishek Joshi, Abhay_Joshi)
description:
This is a 2d platform game where you have to clear obstacles to complete the levels but you are not alone in your journey. You can anywhere switch between your second view to help your first view to clear the level but you have to be quick , you have limited time to clear a level or the level will reset .

The two views in the game and level reset represent the themes of the jam 

Try solving the puzzles in each level

How to play- 

A -  Move left 

D -   Move right 

Space - Jump 

Esc - Pause Game

Left Alt - Switch between views 

Made in 48 hours for BYOG GameJam 2021
